meanings: Noun 포드 Gerald R ~ (1913-2006) ((미국의 제38대 대통령(1974-77)))
[Suffix] Indicating a place on a river suitable for crossing or fording.

vlive.korean: 톰포드 화보 어땠냐고요? "How did it go with Tom Ford photoshoot?" 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 190713🐰
vlive.english: "How did it go with Tom Ford photoshoot?"

vlive.korean: 톰 포드 좋아해요. I like Tom Ford. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : Everything is OK
그걸 딱 보자마자 아 톰포드님은 천재구나라고 느낄 수 있어요. You will able to feel that Tom Ford is a genius as soon as you watch it. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [WJSN] 에뉩니온 브이앱 보는 지금 이순간이 내 인생영화야🎬✨ (WJSN talking about movie)
vlive.english: You will able to feel that Tom Ford is a genius as soon as you watch it.

vlive.korean: 톰포드. - 지금 사용한 거예요. TOM FORD. - I used it today. 듣기 View video Chi Pu : CHI PU X Ssin 씬님 K-BEAUTY Trip #LIKE IT 파우치 대공개 (feat. 씬님, 미스코리아 뷰스타 이쌀)
vlive.english: TOM FORD. - I used it today.

vlive.korean: Lee Juno씨가 성추행 혐의로 경찰에 입건이 됐고요. He was charged by the police ford sexual harassment. 듣기 View video 10PM : 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 A night's entertainment news
vlive.english: He was charged by the police ford sexual harassment.

examples.korean: Two minutes later Ford equalized with a penalty. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 2분 후에 포드가 페널티골로 동점을 만들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Two minutes later Ford equalized with a penalty. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They’re negotiating a tie-up with Ford. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 포드사와의 합병을 협상하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They’re negotiating a tie-up with Ford. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was a clear foul by Ford on the goalkeeper. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 골키퍼에 대한 포드의 분명한 반칙이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was a clear foul by Ford on the goalkeeper. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In the immortal words of Henry Ford, ‘If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook 헨리 포드가 남긴 불후의 명언으로 말하자면, “고장나지 않았으면 고치지 마라.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In the immortal words of Henry Ford, ‘If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: in the case of the State versus Ford 듣기 Add to Wordbook 국가 대 포드의 소송 사건 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: in the case of the State versus Ford Add to Wordbook
